channel.title: Adobe Cs6 vs Cs5 vs Cs4 and so on
channel.description: I quite enjoyed the cs4 stage of products but by far Adobe Cs6 has proven worthy of my time, as i use photoshop and audition the most, one can tell that my design and audio taste has landed my favor with the Cs6 version of products merely due to the ability to produce much higher quality of work, that and Cs5 was practically Cs4 with heartworms >.>

item.title: Adobe Cs6 vs Cs5 vs Cs4 and so on
item.dc:creator: @tranomo tranomo
item.description:
@tranomo wrote:

[quote=“BitchPk, post:11, topic:444784”]My School pays every year for the newest Adobe for all of our students.

So last year school bought for everyone cs5 lisence and this year they bought cs5.5

and prob next year they gona give us cs6

but for so far i use cs5.5 and i like it, using after effects,premiere,photoshop,dreamweaver,audition the most and sometimes illustrator and indesign[/quote]
cs5 is a terrible memory hog, i run on only 2gb and i’ve definatley noticed a difference in cs6.

Read full topic

item.title: Adobe Cs6 vs Cs5 vs Cs4 and so on
item.dc:creator: @tranomo tranomo
item.description:
@tranomo wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:7, topic:444784”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=547474.msg4014551#msg4014551 date=1339516118]
Cs6 is out? lolwut
[/quote]

I am not 100% sure but I think it will be out soon.

-I had a photoshop class in school this year and we used cs5 but right at the end of the year we took a look at cs6 on adobe’s website. They are adding a lot of helpful stuff; however, I don’t remember any of the features specifically.[/quote]
cs6 has been out for a couple of weeks…

I use PS, After Effects and Flash.
